fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make cute sounds and distract a player during the night, giving them powerful defence. After a player has been distracted, they only way they can communicate the following day is to whisper to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role randomly has either an evil goal or a good goal. If it has an evil goal, you gain access to all factional evil chats, though you do not count as a member of that faction.
- Anybody who attacks you has a 51% chance of also dying.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose / Live to see the Town win
